# sonatyperepo_capability_custom_s3_regions (Resource)

Manage Capability: Custom S3 Regions
		
**NOTE:** Requires Sonatype Nexus Repostiory 3.84.0 or later.

## Example Usage

```terraform
resource "sonatyperepo_capability_custom_s3_regions" "cap" {
  enabled = true
  notes   = "These are notes from Terraform"
  properties = {
    regions = ["somewhere-1", "somewhere-2"]
  }
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `enabled` (Boolean) Whether the Capability is enabled.
- `properties` (Attributes) Properties specific to this Capability type (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--properties))

### Optional

- `notes` (String) Optional notes about configured capability.

### Read-Only

- `id` (String) The internal ID of the Capability.
- `last_updated` (String) String representation of the date/time the resource was last changed

<a id="nestedatt--properties"></a>
### Nested Schema for `properties`

Required:

- `regions` (Set of String) Custom S3 Regions.

## Import

Import is supported using the following syntax:

```shell
# Import an existing S3 Custom Region Capability into Terraform State.
#
# NOTE: The CAPABILITY_ID can be obtained from the datasource.

# Example
terraform import sonatyperepo_capability_custom_s3_regions.cap CAPABILITY_ID
```
